## Goal
Build interactive charts and visualizations for connections, engagement, network composition, profile completeness, referrals, community participation, and mentorship impact.

## Tasks
- [ ] Design backend analytics service and Prisma schema changes
- [ ] Implement endpoints for all core metrics and visualizations
- [ ] Create frontend chart components (line, pie, bar, area, funnel, gauge)
- [ ] Integrate Recharts and calendar heatmap libraries
- [ ] Add summary cards and recommendations section
- [ ] Write unit/integration tests for metric calculations

## Acceptance Criteria
- All visualizations described in the [parent issue](./dashboard-analytics-core.md) are implemented
- Charts are interactive and update dynamically
- Summary cards and recommendations are visible
- Tests cover >85% of analytics logic
